name: HOOD
description: Hood.fun is a Solana-based token launchpad that makes launching and trading tokens simple and accessible. Built on Meteoraâ€™s Dynamic Bonding Curve (DBC), it allows creators to mint tokens directly on the site with integrated liquidity and migration. Users can choose custom fee tiers of 0.25%, 1%, 2%, or 4%, which are split 50/50 between the platform and the creator, giving project owners control over their revenue model. With one-click launches, real-time charts, and direct trading, Hood.fun streamlines the process for both beginners and experienced developers while empowering creators to grow and sustain their projects.
